nodes.text: Kulbart Zamoon was a Centran Human male pilot who fought in the Galactic Civil War for the Rebel Alliance. He joined after the lack of Imperial intervention against the terrorism on his homeworld of Erilnar.  Prior to the Battle of Hoth, he attended Princess Leia's pilot briefing before heading to his fighter and flying under the callsign Blue Twelve in the battle. He wore a helmet bearing a blue Alliance Starbird.
Kulbart Zamoon was first identified in "Rogues Gallery: Clearance for Immediate Launch" in Star Wars Insider 146.
